summary.description:
Today, drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.5 mm).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1210 m), feels like temperature (up 2.8°C), outside temperature (up 2.4°C), and inside temperature (up 2.0°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 273.0m higher than yesterday, 596.3m lower than the past week, 1210.0m lower than the past month.

Yesterday’s cloud levels showed a low of 765m and a peak of 2220m, averaging 1538.7m; the week and month recorded warmer averages.
cloud levels.summary: Expect mostly clear skies with high cloud.

summary.summary: Inside; a mild and comfortable temperature is anticipated. Outside; warm but comfortable temperatures are expected. Also, humidity will be high and noticeable. Drizzle or light rain possible, mostly clear skies with high cloud, and sunlight will be very intense and bright. The weather may change rapidly and become worse.
